name: Windows 10 Style Menu List - Firefox
description: This style is based on GNOME styled menu List view. Designed for Windows 10, this revised style provides a wider, text based menu. This style has not been tested on MacOS or Linux.
additional_info: Like the original, this style is incompatible with some third party add-ons and will display them oddly. Unfortunately I'm a novice and do not know how to fix this issue, please contact me if you do. The second and third screenshots show Firefox Edge (Light & Dark). This style is compatible with both the light and dark themes.
